data.name: Error.UnableToAccessRegistry
data.value: Unable to access registry

data.name: Error.Database.UnableToConnect
data.value: Unable to connect to the Database

data.name: Solution.DirectoryNotFoundException
data.value: Reinstall the application and/or make sure, that the directory exists.

data.name: Solution.UnauthorizedAccessException
data.value: Make sure you have enough access privileges. Try logging into windows using a different account or talk to your administrator.

data.name: Solution.ExceptionPathTooLongException
data.value: Please reinstall or move the application to a path not as long for example: "C:\Program Files\PokerTell\ ".

data.name: Solution.LiveTracker.FileWatcher.ArgumentException
data.value: Make sure that the Hand History for the AutoTracker still exists and/or check the Hand History Folder in the Poker Room Settings.

data.name: Solution.IOException
data.value: Make sure you have access to the drive and directory you are trying to access and that the file you are trying to write to or delete is not currently in use.

data.name: Solution.ImportPokerOffice.InvalidOperationException
data.value: Please check the Poker Office database settings and make sure the MySQL Database in Poker Office is functioning properly.

data.name: Solution.System.Security.SecurityException
data.value: Make sure you have enough access privileges. Try logging into windows using a different account or talk to your administrator.

data.name: Solution.ImportPokerOffice.OutOfMemoryException
data.value: The PokerOffice Database is very large. PokerTell will now import as many HandHistoriess as possible. You may run this import again to import the remaining HandHistoriess

data.name: Solution.Main.PokerRooms.FileNotFoundException
data.value: Add the PokerRoom and enter its settings again via the Manage Rooms option.

data.name: Solution.MySqlException.BAD_HOST_ERROR
data.value: Make sure, that the database server is running. Another reason for this problem could be, that the host was set incorrectly in the database settings. In that case you should correct this, generally 'localhost' will work.

data.name: Solution.MySqlException.ACCESS_DENIED_ERROR
data.value: PokerTell was unable to connect to the host specified in the settings. Please make sure the database server is running and check the Database Settings. Check that the hostname, username and possibly password were entered correctly.

data.name: Solution.MySqlException.BAD_DB_ERROR
data.value: The database you were trying to access doesn't exist. Please create and/or choose another database to use with PokerTell.

data.name: Solution.Database.InvalidOperationException
data.value: Connect to the MySql Server first by using the Database Settings.

data.name: Warning.ImportDirectory.ErrorWhileImporting
data.value: An error occurred while trying to import the Hand Histories. No hands were imported.

data.name: Warning.ImportDirectory.DirectoryNotFound
data.value: Couldn't find the specified directory. Please enter a correct one, preferrably using the Browse option.

data.name: Warning.DatabaseSettings.UnableToConnect
data.value: Unable to connect. Please make sure the database server is running and check the Database Settings.

data.name: Info.ConnectPokerOffice.Connected
data.value: Connected to the specified Poker Office Server. Now you can choose and connect to a Poker Office Database.

data.name: Warning.DatabaseSettings.MySQLNotFound
data.value: Couldn't find a MySQl installation. If you are sure it is installed carefully enter the settings.

data.name: Warning.NoPokerRoomSelected
data.value: Please select a PokerRoom from the Rooms Menu or if needed add Rooms via the Manage Rooms option first.

data.name: Warning.Database.UnableToConnectToPokerOfficeServer
data.value: PokerTell was unable to connect to the PokerOffice Database Server using the username and password specified in the settings. Please correct this first before trying to connect to the PokerOffice Database.

data.name: Warning.Database.UnableToConnectToPokerOfficeDatabase
data.value: PokerTell was unable to connect to the PokerOffice Database specified in the Database settings. Please make sure the MySql Server is running an/or reconnect to the PokerOffice database using the Database Menu.

data.name: Warning.ImportDirectory.FilesNotFound
data.value: Didn't find any files with the specified extension in the specified directory and therefore cannot import anything.

data.name: Warning.DatabaseSettings.InvalidForServerConnect
data.value: Please enter a server and username in order to test the connection.

data.name: Info.Database.DatabaseCreated
data.value: Successfully created the {0} database.

data.name: Error.Unexpected
data.value: PokerTell encountered an unexpected error
